town in the urban area of St. Joseph Township (pop. 1200).  It has a permanent population of approx. 400 and is the business center of

.  Services offered in the community include municipal water and sewers, hydrants, municipal fire department base, hospital, medical centre, pharmacy, ambulance base, massage therapy clinic, counseling office, grocery store, liquor store, bank, post office, elementary school, municipal offices, marina, historic town hall, community centre, sportsplex, restaurants, artisan shops and galleries, gas station, variety store, accommodation, public parks, beaches and tennis court.
